description.p: Custom homebrew content created by TricktheTrickster.
This is the mark of someone that had accept a suspicion revive offer in their darkest moment, it will show up on the back of their most use hand after the first long rest they took since the offer.

Bargain: For 8 hours after you finish a long rest, you gain a +2 bonus to your Armor Class. However, you cannot benefit from another long rest until at least 20 hours have passed since the end of your last one.

sheet.description: +2 AC for 8 hours after a long rest. Cannot long rest again until 20 hours after your last one.
